reviews.review: çok eğlenceli bir oyun

Saw this game being streamed. Read posts about swf and solo play. Bought. Satisfied. Found people to play with to see if swf was evil and op. Have not found that swf is op, but can be evil. Still satisfied. Playing killer vs swf is def harder but also def different gameplay. Matches vs swf feel very competitive and chase-y, like ooooh, whoa dude, sun of a bi***, oh u are getting the basement hook now fam, point at me will you? Whereas matches vs non-swf feel more game atmospheric - thrilling/hidey, gotcha!, aagh!, must be quiet... sneaky sneaky, THIS LOCKER!!! AHAHAHAH. Both can be very fun, both can be a little tiresome at times. I've started to play matches with 1 or no perks added to see if I can overcome the challenge as killer, esp vs swf. I've had some good talks with people who at first were like oooooooooooooo stomped you at the expense one of my teammates! Then they see i had just 1 starting perk on a level 1 executioner with no addons and only a bloodpoint bonus sacrifice and then re-evaluate their overwhelming survival. Caveat - sometimes this has caused people not to take me seriously or think i'm the asshat when I say gg! wp! if i end up getting a 4kill with the same setup, but I can't do anything about that except remove the exclamation marks or something.   

Salt is easy to pass around, but also easy to get through if you just talk. 
Good game, fun to play. But from what i've seen there are many of the same people related challenges in this game that can burn people out quick if they don't develop good habits.

Come try your luck in the fog!

Dead By Daylight is a game that I initially played on Xbox One, since my computer did not meet the necessary resources but I liked it and quite the truth. It has some not excellent graphics but they are fine then we have the menus that in my opinion are perfect then the murderers and the survivors that the truth is I quite like the models I would also like to customize the murderers such as: Ghostface, Freddy Krueger, etc. The negative thing that I would highlight the most are the murderers who as soon as they hang up on you stay still watching you and until you die they do not leave. That in my opinion is the worst.
In my opinion 8/10

I only have one hand and therefore I am trash at most games. With that being said, I am absolutely trash at this game. However, I still have fun trying to survive and/or attempting to kill strangers. Don't get me wrong, I get some mean comments now and then, but I always let them know that I have one hand and make them feel bad. It's rewarding. Best game for this COVID quarantine. Best game for the spooky season.

the game is way more fun with friends. You can still play with randos but you will run into a toxic player 8 times out 10 whether you are the killer or survivor. Overall the game is fun. You have to repair generators (gennys) to escape or find the key for a secret hatch. Or you could just let the killer catch you :)
If you can look past the bugs that you may encounter it is a really fun game. The moment you learn how to really play though is when it gets really good.

O jogo é incrível, super divertido e tem algumas variações de builds e estratégias.
Aprender a jogar é um pouco complicado e demora algum tempo até pegar a prática, jogo a uns dois meses direto e ainda não sei loopar/quebrar loops, mas com o tempo aprendo.

Prós: Variação de personagens, próprios e licensiados, mapas variados e skins legais.
Contra: Preço das skins altos pro Brasil (como sempre), bugs e queda de performance.

The best game ever

First off: I highly recommend only getting this game if you are going to play with friends, or are just going to be a killer main. For example, the game is a lot more fun and easier with friends who even slightly know what there doing, rather than the normal idiots who do nothing but hide all game (This is coming from a rank 1 survivor btw). Killer is much easier overall, and can be a lot more fun (and you obviously can't get teammates to drag you down or whatnot). Matchmaking is 50/50 as well. You'll either get dumb teammates and sweaty killer or great teammates and rank 20 killer. This game is both absolute fucking dogwater and great at the same time. I'm not sure how to describe it.
